english.segment1: Perched upon the lap of hope and northern slopes. Nestled in the wooded oak, a dream unfolds
english.segment2: Come and see. The confectionary. Very merry. The confectionary
english.segment3: The continued hum of notes and needle pokes. Garland with a hint of snow 'round the windows
english.segment4: Come and see. The confectionary. Very merry. The confectionary
english.segment5: You stir all the sweetened pots and watch the clocks. The time has come to close the shop that time forgot..
